title: unknown ultra bold display type
content:
Can anyone identify the font that is (hopefully) below? What The Font was fruitless...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018091944im_/http:/typophile.com/files/text-sample-pd-20090113_4015.jpg)
author: pauldaniel

comments.content:
Whoever made this isn't familiar with [overshoot](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018091944/http:/typophile.com/wiki/overshoot). I'll bet on custom letters by a graphic designer or something free.

If you want something done proper, try [Titling Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018091944/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/titling_gothic_condensed_black/?sample_text=FLAOUT&sample_size=74).
Great. Thanks. Yes, Titling Gothic is the way to go in this instance..
